replies.body:
{{champion:27}} Leona can I have that back please. 

{{champion:89}} Why? 

{{champion:57}} I'M UNSTOPPABLE!!!!

{{champion:89}} Oh

{{champion:63}} Where'd that Maokai go wandering off to...

{{champion:57}} _Just blend in to the scenery and he can't see me. Think like a tree._
{{champion:54}} Go away Moakai! Your gonna blow my cover!
{{champion:86}} No guys please don't leave!

{{champion:17}} Yeah! If you leave Garen wont sit in this bush with me anymore!

{{champion:86}} WHEN DAH FUQ DID YOU GET HERE?!?!
{{champion:83}}  I've been here this whole time and you still didn't see me.

{{champion:83}} You will never forg-
{{champion:19}} Hey guys, the new champion is here!
{{champion:83}} ....

{{champion:82}} (walking past the bush with Sona) Where should I put a ward, here?
{{champion:37}} (nods)
{{champion:82}} (puts a Vision Ward down, sees all the people there) ...um, what?
{{champion:37}} ...
{{champion:82}} ...well, misery loves company. (kicks Teemo out of the way) Move over Garen, me and Sona are going to take a spot here... oh hi Yorick, didn't notice you until just now.

{{champion:3}}

http://ci.memecdn.com/301/154301.jpg
I CAN'T UPVOTE THIS ALL FAST ENOUGH
{{champion:14}} LEAVE YOU FOOLS!!! THIS IS WHERE I'M WAITING TO ULT THE ENEMY TEAM FROM!!!
I have a hard time believing that singed would just "uh... okay" his poison away
I'm fairly sure the man has like 50 of those vats.
My question is does that kill her or only her plant part?
She is a plant.
No only part plant. Zyra is a plant that took over the dead body of a mage.
replicated, not take over. she is 100% plant.
If she is 100% plant I don't see a reason to replicate pink colored skin, plants don't need that

https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/fd/Murud_N._lowii_20.jpg/400px-Murud_N._lowii_20.jpg

It's to attract prey.
Wrong, she **ate** that mage and took her shape as a side effect of her magic.

But, what happens when her weeds are killed off and wither away?

***Zyra's DEFENSE dropped to 0!**
rly xD
